name: Matrix Life Science - PhytoLite Natural Plant Sterols
description: Matrix Life Science offers PhytoLite Natural Plant Sterols, organic and unblended phytosterols that are economical and profitable. Customizable per client needs for barrier repair and natural formulation applications. Provides natural cholesterol alternatives with anti-inflammatory benefits.
notes: PhytoLite brand emphasizes natural and organic credentials. Unblended formulation ensures purity. Customizable per client needs provides flexibility. Economical and profitable positioning suggests competitive pricing.
